results.title: House of Wax
results.brief_description: A group of unwitting teens are stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.

constellations_other.name: Movies on wax
constellations_other.description: Waxing lyrical about the supernatural and early 21st-century teen stars.

results.title: House of wax
results.creator_credit: Andre De Toth, Bryan Foy and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: Professor Henry Jarrod is a renowned wax sculptor who is plunged into madness when an arsonist burns down his wax museum. Jarrod loses his life’s work and, having lost the ability to use his flame-scarred hands, comes up with a new way of stocking his reformed House of Wax in New York. Aided by his mute assistant (Charles Bronson), he dips his victims in wax! Cast includes Vincent Price, Frank Lovejoy, Phyllis Kirk and Carolyn Jones.

results.title: House of treasures: the magic eye
results.brief_description: Illustrates the development of photographic technology through an exposition of archival photos of colonial Australia. Reveals some of the techniques and processes used in early photographic work, and highlights several old cameras. Quaint and static in its exploration of historical depiction of idiomatic Australia. Narrated by Noel Brophy.

results.title: House of sand and fog
results.creator_credit: Vadim Perelman, Michael London, Colbalt Media Group and NBCUniversal
results.brief_description: The is a film about a house which, due to a bureaucratic blunder, is sold in error. Conflict arrises between the now two owners. The original owner played by Jennifer Connelly, a recovering addict, does not want to give the house up. The new owner (Ben Kinsley) having recently fled from Iran with his family feels the same way. The film stands out for its fine acting both powerful and emotional. Themes such as the importance of a home and a persons place are told. Each owner has a compelling story and it seems are equally worthy in this moving conflict. This suspensful fine drama was nominated for three Academy Awards.

results.title: House of knowledge
results.creator_credit: Larry O'Reilly and RKO Pathe Pictures
results.brief_description: A panoramic study of the Smithsonian Institution, which supplies its immense collection of art and museum pieces largely by its own exploration and searching. Mentions briefly ethnology, biology, entomology and other sciences - giving glimpses of work in each field. Shows field teams investigating a new volcano, and archaeologists in Mexico.

results.title: House of games
results.creator_credit: David Mamet, Michael Hausman, Orion Pictures Corporation and Filmhaus Productions
results.brief_description: This thriller stars Lindsay Crouse as a successful psychologist and best-selling author of “Driven: obsession and compulsion in everyday life” who becomes increasingly drawn into the shadowy underworld of a confidence trickster, Joe Mantegna, and his enigmatic cohorts, discovering that the thrill of the con answers deep-rooted needs unfulfilled by her daily round of listening to other people’s problems. Screenplay by David Mamet.

results.title: House of Flying Daggers
results.brief_description: In 9th century China, a corrupt government wages war against a rebel army called the Flying Daggers. A romantic warrior breaks a beautiful rebel out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

results.title: House in the jungle
results.creator_credit: John Power and Australian Broadcasting Commission
results.brief_description: Follows the journey of a group of peasants from central Java to a new settlement in Sumatra in an official migration scheme, showing some of Indonesia’s national problems of economic and political life incidentally.

results.title: House afire
results.brief_description: A short instructional cautionary film describing the dangers of fire - particularly bushfires during the 1950s and 1960s, accompanied by footage of the fires. A narrator details simple ways in which house holders can protect their homes against destruction.

results.title: Houdini never died
results.brief_description: Examines the pervasive influence of Houdini on magicans throughout the world. Contains rare footage of Houdini and shows other noted magicans at work. Narrated by Burgess Meredith.
